Drombler FX - Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2014-04-27  | Version: 0.3
Drombler FX - Maven Plugin
Parent Project
  • Drombler FX - Parent
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

drombler-fx:standalone-zip

Full name:

org.drombler.fx:drombler-fx-maven-plugin:0.3:standalone-zip

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: compile+runtime.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: package.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
targetDirectory File - (no description)
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/deployment/standalone.
User property is: dromblerfx.targetDirectory.
userdir String - (no description)
Default value is: ${dollar}{user.home}/.${brandingId}/${project.version}.
User property is: dromblerfx.userdir.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
brandingId String - (no description)
User property is: dromblerfx.brandingId.
configPropertiesFile File - (no description)
Default value is: ${basedir}/src/main/resources/config.properties.
User property is: dromblerfx.configProperties.
height double - (no description)
User property is: dromblerfx.height.
project MavenProject - The Maven project.
Default value is: ${project}.
systemPropertiesFile File - (no description)
Default value is: ${basedir}/src/main/resources/system.properties.
User property is: dromblerfx.systemProperties.
title String - (no description)
User property is: dromblerfx.title.
width double - (no description)
User property is: dromblerfx.width.

Parameter Details

brandingId:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: dromblerfx.brandingId

configPropertiesFile:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • User Property: dromblerfx.configProperties
  • Default: ${basedir}/src/main/resources/config.properties

height:

(no description)
  • Type: double
  • Required: No
  • User Property: dromblerfx.height

project:

The Maven project.
  • Type: org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project}

systemPropertiesFile:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • User Property: dromblerfx.systemProperties
  • Default: ${basedir}/src/main/resources/system.properties

targetDirectory:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: dromblerfx.targetDirectory
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/deployment/standalone

title:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: dromblerfx.title

userdir:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: dromblerfx.userdir
  • Default: ${dollar}{user.home}/.${brandingId}/${project.version}

width:

(no description)
  • Type: double
  • Required: No
  • User Property: dromblerfx.width
